doc:
Brad Morrow https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brad_Morrow 0 Brad Morrow, born Bradley Steven Mora, credited during his childhood as Bradley Mora, (May 12, 1942 in Chicago – November 7, 1997 in Northridge, Los Angeles) was a child actor who appeared on Broadway, in film and on television beginning at the age of two. Morrow was spotted in New York by MGM and appeared in films during the 1950s. He worked for Disney where he was cast as a Mousketeer before being pulled from the project to appear in Disney's Spin and Marty series. As a young adult, he changed his name to Morrow and toured with the stage productions of both West Side Story and The Diary of Anne Frank. In 1961, he appeared in the final episode of the television police drama The Asphalt Jungle. After his acting career ended, he went into business management and was president of CII Premium Finance in Burbank, California, when he resigned because of ill health and died of cancer a year later at the age of 55. Brad_Morrow , born Bradley_Steven_Mora , credited during his_childhood as Bradley_Mora , ( May_12_,_1942 in Chicago – November_7_,_1997 in Northridge , Los_Angeles ) was a_child_actor who appeared on Broadway , in film and on television_beginning at the_age of two . Morrow was_spotted in New_York by MGM and appeared in films during the_1950s . He worked for Disney where he was_cast as a_Mousketeer before being_pulled from the_project to_appear in Disney 's_Spin and Marty_series . As a_young_adult , he changed his_name to Morrow and toured with the_stage_productions of both_West_Side_Story and The_Diary of Anne_Frank . In 1961 , he appeared in the_final_episode of the_television_police drama The_Asphalt_Jungle . After his_acting_career ended , he went into business_management and was president of CII_Premium_Finance in Burbank , California , when he resigned because_of ill_health and died of cancer a_year later at the_age of 55 .
